org.forum.api.jpa.dao

Interface MessageRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Message,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Message,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Message,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Message>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Message,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface MessageRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Message,java.lang.Long>
    Persistence layer class provides methods to manage message entries in database using JDBC library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<MessageBody> getMessageBodyById(java.lang.Long id)
      Connects to database and returns message body based on specified id mapped on MessageBody data model.
      java.util.List<MessageHeader> getMessageHeaderList()
      Connects to database and returns message headers with corresponding id mapped on MessageHeader data model.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository

        deleteAllInBatch, deleteInBatch, findAll, findAll, findAll, findAll, findAllById, flush, getOne, saveAll, saveAndFlush

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository

        findAll

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findById, save

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor

        count, exists, findAll, findOne

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageHeaderList

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW org.forum.api.dto.MessageHeader(m.id, m.header) FROM Message m")
java.util.List<MessageHeader> getMessageHeaderList()
        Connects to database and returns message headers with corresponding id mapped on MessageHeader data model.
        Returns:
        list of MessageHeader data model

      • getMessageBodyById

        @Query(value="SELECT NEW org.forum.api.dto.MessageBody(m.body) FROM Message m WHERE m.id = :id")
java.util.Optional<MessageBody> getMessageBodyById(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long id)
        Connects to database and returns message body based on specified id mapped on MessageBody data model. Optional container is used for null checks
        Parameters:
        id - id of message body to get
        Returns:
        MessageBody data model within Optional container
